item.description: We have had enough of celebrating our great nation in the winter....lets celebrate it like back home in the scorching heat! Join us for the first annual Boston Demons Australia Day in July....just like in Australia but in the Boston summer. We have Aussie food, beers, music, giveaways and importantly a patio out the back for a beer. Bring all your mates and have a great time! Get there early as the bar will fill up quick!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australia Day in July (hosted by Boston Demons)
